short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A screen capture extension for QuadCom QloudPBX UFC Platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Extension for the amazing QloudPBX Unified Communication Solution from QuadCom.ch. The Extension allows a presenter of  Groupchat, Channel or Webinar to share the entire Screen or a particular window in realtime with all participants with a QuadCom QloudPBX Webmeeting, internal Channel Collaboration in stunning HD and low latency.

This Extensions is intended for QuadCom QloudPBX Users only an requires either an paid QloudPBX Account for Business or Home, or if you are invited for secure online webmeeting as external guest.

Share your Desktop or Application Windows within QloudPBX Webinar
Share your Desktop or Application Windows within QloudPBX Groupchat
Share your Desktop or Application Windows within external Users, invited to QloudPBX via SecureToken
